item.title: Neural network with Flux
item.description: short intro text goes here using Flux import CSV using DataFrames using Random using Statistics The first thing we need to do is download our data, which we will store in our local folder. The data are available from the UCI Machine Learning repository. To make sure that we do not download the dataset more often than necessary, we will write a short function to download the dataset if it doesn't exist, and if it exists, to return it as a data frame:
